page.$comment: This object will hold common attributes to pages. Not limited to below

page.page_title: ## The page title. Used in displaying in page. ##

link.$comment: <a> Common link structure. This can be associated with images, text, etc...

image.title: ## title/tooltip ##
srcset.$comment: (optional) A list of sources with different sizes
